duties_responsibilities.duty: Recording and maintaining customers’ accounts receivables by performing essential duties such as preparing daily cash deposits, entering finalized cash receipts, obtaining and mailing invoice copies, processing daily credit card deposits, filing check stubs and bank receipts, researching and processing customer claims of invoice payment, researching and processing charge backs, returns, and bad checks, answering AR phone inquiries, and calling and/or mailing correspondence to customers as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree in Accounting, Finance, or Business
